p: Growth performance parameters were not significantly different (p > 0.05) among the treatments, although FBW was numerically higher in shrimps fed with the diets 4, 6, 7, and 8 compared to the other diets (Table 3). Similarly, the feed efficiencies, including FCR, PER, PPV and LPV were also not significantly different among treatments. Differences in survival rate among treatments were not significant (Table 3).
